desc: Antimicrobial and Hygienic PVC Wall Cladding panels for hygiene-critical environments requiring infection control, including hospitals, healthcare, food production, schools, prisons and manufacturing. Scratch-resistant, sterile surfaces prevents the spread of viruses and bacteria.

layout.text: AM-Clad and AM-Guard products create antimicrobial surfaces which kill germs and prevent the rapid spread of infection and contagions.
